content.question: The trend depicted in the graph between the years 1899 and 1937 is best understood in the context of which of the following developments?

choices.label: The heightening of tensions resulting from Afro-Caribbean immigration
A rise in the number of agricultural jobs in Southern states
The surge in the number of Black Southerners moving to the North
Increased Afro-Caribbean immigration into the United States

content.answer: Increased Afro-Caribbean immigration into the United States

skill.text: 1.B: Identify and explain the context of a specific event, development, or process.
